sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SEPULCHRAL, ſomething belonging to ſepulchres or tombs : thus a ſepulchral column is a column erected over a tomb, with an inſcription on its ſhaft ; and ſepulchral lamps, thoſe ſaid to have been found burning in the tombs of ſeveral martyrs and others. See Lamp.
